#include<stdio.h>
 
int main()
{
	int t,h[256],i,cost;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	char s[201];
	while(t--)
	{
		for(i=0;i<256;i++)
			h[i]=0;
		scanf("%s",s);
		i=0;
		while(s[i])
		{
			h[s[i]]++;
			i++;
		}
		cost = 0;
		for(i='A';i<='z';i++)
			if(h[i]&1)
				cost += h[i]/2 + 1;
			else 				
				cost += h[i]/2;
		printf("%d\n",cost);
	}
	return 0;
}
